data.name: Fractured Space - Captain Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Captain Pack is the intermediate value bundle for existing Fractured Space players


The Captain Pack includes:
EXCLUSIVE SKINS
  • USR Colossus - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • USR Brawler - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • Zarek Hunter - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • Zarek Superlifter - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • TDS Protector - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • TDS Paladin - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • 1,000 Platinum
  • 10 Crew Pods (Contain Crew Member Templates)
  • 30,000 DNA
  • Credit Boosters (50)
data.about_the_game:
The Captain Pack is the intermediate value bundle for existing Fractured Space players


The Captain Pack includes:
EXCLUSIVE SKINS

  • TDS Paladin - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • 1,000 Platinum
  • 10 Crew Pods (Contain Crew Member Templates)
  • 30,000 DNA
  • Credit Boosters (50)
data.short_description: The Captain Pack is the intermediate bundle for Fractured Space players to acquire the exclusive Black Edition skins, Crew Members and a useful Credit and Platinum boost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64bit Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
